message:
Even if the client side of the application is not supposed to run on the same computer it does not mean it is forbidden to do so either (even though it is pointless from the functional point of view I agree). 
What I meant is that, if the user decides to run the client part of the application on the same computer what is the correct way to differentiate the client side of the application from the test connection handled internally to monitor the listening socket state?
